thread.title: Emma Watson’s flowing yellow gown is so 2017 Belle
thread.title_full: Emma Watson’s flowing yellow gown is so 2017 Belle

author: Trilby Beresford
title: Emma Watson’s flowing yellow gown is so 2017 Belle
text:
Emma Watson’s flowing yellow gown is so 2017 Belle There are some actresses who just never cease to amaze us with their ability to choose the most gorgeous and inspiring outfits, and this girl has a particular knack for it. Emma Watson is literally Belle in this yellow dress from Dior Haute Couture, and we love how she wore it to an event for children at the New York Film Society . Watson is always giving back and sharing her love of all things good , especially books — and at this event, she read passages from Beauty and the Beast. BUT back to the dress.
It’s a beautiful shade of creamy yellow, and she totally looks like a real-life princess! Jamie McCarthy/Getty Images We love those spaghetti straps, the low neckline, and the super flowy material. It’s playful and young, while also managing to be utterly sophisticated. Here’s Watson giving her speech up on stage in the eye-catching dress.
Did you get a good look at the BACK?!
YouTube/Screenslam Now that it’s getting warmer, we’re totally gonna bring back the yellow!
We love how Watson has been sharing her sustainable and eco-friendly outfits via her fashion Insta account The Press Tour, because it’s great to see someone with such a public platform champion such an important cause. She’s shared so many stunning looks, like this one crafted from leftover fabric from Elia Saab’s Haute Couture collection.
A post shared by The Press Tour (@the_press_tour) on Feb 27, 2017 at 9:21am PST 
Never stop being your thoughtful, generous, and stylish self, Emma!
